name: Red Dead Quotes
description: Quotes from the Red Dead video game franchise.
author: Mello

quotes.quote: If we have to fight, we fight. If we have to run, We’ll run. If we must die, we’ll die. But...we’ll stay free.
quotes.author: Javier Escuella

quotes.quote: We're more ghosts than people now.
quotes.author: Arthur Morgan

quotes.quote: I ain't got too much to say no more.
quotes.author: Dutch Van Der Linde

quotes.quote: We're thieves in a world that don't want us no more
quotes.author: Arthur Morgan

quotes.quote: I believe there's winners and losers, and nothing else besides.
quotes.author: Micah Bell

quotes.quote: I wish I had acquired wisdom at less of a price.
quotes.author: Hosea

quotes.quote: I gave you all I had. I did.
quotes.author: Arthur Morgan

quotes.quote: I have a plan, this is a good one.
quotes.author: Dutch Van Der Linde
